alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Natrona County through 300 PM MDT... At 226 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Teapot Rock, which is also 26 miles north of Casper, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Natrona County. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 205 and 234. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
